org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.shared

Interface GeometricObject

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ContentObject, Region
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdvertRegion, ChartRegion, ChemRegion, FrameRegion, GeometricObjectImpl, Glyph, GraphicRegion, ImageRegion, LineDrawingRegion, LowLevelTextObject, MathsRegion, MusicRegion, NoiseRegion, RegionImpl, SeparatorRegion, TableRegion, TextLine, TextRegion, Word

    public interface GeometricObject
    Interface for any object that can be located on a page (e.g. border, text region, word).
    Author:
    clc
